name: Mighty Rivals
description:
Mighty Rivals is a small 1v1 competitive scoring hack and slash experience.

The goal is to get more score than your opponent by slashing waves of minions for a game of three minutes.

Slashing minions of your color will grant you more damage and height, but slow you and your weapon down. Slashing minions of the opposite color will have the opposite effect!

Use two controllers to play.

X button : melee attack

Y button : range attack

B button : dash

Made in four days by a team of nine people for @isartdigital #gameweek ! The theme of the jam was : "gameplay mash-up : Hack n' slash + ?"
